page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: There are 11 churches in our area. 6 are Church of Scotland Parish Churches. 1 Abbotshall Church. 2 Bethelfield Church. 3 Invertiel Parish Church. 4 St. Brycedale Church. 5 St. Andrews Parish Church. 6 St. Johns Parish Church. The other churches are 7 St. Peters Episcopal Church. 8 West End Congregational Church. 9 Whytescauseway Baptist Church. 10 Kingdom Hall of Jehovah's Witness. 11 Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints. Attached to these churches are groups such as Guides, Boys Brigade, Young Women's Groups and Men's Associations. There are adequate churches for all religions.
